jervis.remotes
[Groovy] Interface JervisRemote

interface JervisRemote

Provides a minimum standard interface a Jervis remote requires. Throughout Jervis these functions will be called on the remote.

Method Summary
List branches(String project)

Query a remote project for a list of branches.
String getCloneUrl()

Repositories will be cloned from this base Git URI.
String getFile(String project, String file_path, String ref)

Get the contents of a file in a remote git project for a given reference.

ArrayList getFolderListing(String project, String dir_path, String ref)

Get list a file path in a project for the given reference.

String getWebUrl()

A web interface to browse repository code.
String toString()

This method is used by Jervis to output friendly messages including the remote.
 

Method Detail

branches

List branches(String project)
Query a remote project for a list of branches.
Returns:
A List containing all of the branches listed on the remote project.

getCloneUrl

String getCloneUrl()
Repositories will be cloned from this base Git URI.
Returns:
A base git URI in which a repository can be cloned.

getFile

String getFile(String project, String file_path, String ref)
Get the contents of a file in a remote git project for a given reference. Most commonly the file requested will be the Jervis YAML file.
Returns:
A String which contains the contents of the file requested.

getFolderListing

ArrayList getFolderListing(String project, String dir_path, String ref)
Get list a file path in a project for the given reference. This will typically be used to list the contents of the root directory for the reference so that build scripts can be generated from the list.
Returns:
A list of files in the requested file path.

getWebUrl

String getWebUrl()
A web interface to browse repository code.
Returns:
A base web URL in which to browse code.

toString

String toString()
This method is used by Jervis to output friendly messages including the remote.
Returns:
A human readable String for this type of remote.
